author: Second Wind
description:
This video is brought to you by Berserk B.I.T.S, a net-hacking auto-battler launching on November 20th – https://store.steampowered.com/app/2348540/Berserk_BITS/

This week on Hidden Gems, KC and Jess play Raji: An Ancient Epic -- https://store.steampowered.com/app/730390/Raji_An_Ancient_Epic/

If you dig Hot Monday Energy, consider supporting us over on Patreon -- https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

title: Battling Through Hindu Mythology in Raji: An Ancient Epic | Hot Monday Energy

author: Second Wind
description:
This video is brought to you by Berserk B.I.T.S, a net-hacking auto-battler launching on November 20th – https://store.steampowered.com/app/2348540/Berserk_BITS/

In today's episode, J & Ludo delve into the many designs incorporated by FromSoftware to make the Souls series tick.

Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

Second Wind Merch: 
https://store.dftba.com/collections/second-wind
https://sharkrobot.com/collections/second-wind

Music used in order of appearance:
Stray OST - The Notebook
DS3 OST - Epilogue
DS2 OST - King Vendrick
DS2 OST - Majula
DS3 OST - Premonition
DS3 OST - Halflight Spear of the Chruch
DS3 OST - Secret Betrayal
DS1 OST - Soul of Fire
title: The Hidden Secrets of Dark Souls Design | Design Delve

author: Second Wind
description:
This video is brought to you by PlayTracker, the app that tracks your cross-platform game library, achievements, stats, and more! Join the Second Wind guild today! – https://playtracker.net/guild/second-wind/

On this week’s episode of Windbreaker, Yahtzee, JM8, and Marty take a look at the past, present, and future of episodic gaming, in light of the release of AdHoc's Dispatch.

If you dig the stuff we make, consider supporting us over at Patreon -- https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

Check out our new shirts over at DFTBA -- https://store.dftba.com/collections/second-wind

Get your Adventure is Nigh! plushies over at Shark Robot -- https://sharkrobot.com/collections/second-wind
title: The Past, Present, and Future of Episodic Gaming | Windbreaker Podcast
